title: All The Same
brief_description: Asylum seeker Mostafa Azimitabar, know as ‘Moz’ shot and released the music video for his song ‘All The Same’ from inside the Manus Island detention centre via a mobile phone.

constellations_other.name: Seeking asylum
constellations_other.description: Chauka Please Tell Us the Time was covertly filmed on a smartphone inside the Manus Island Detention Centre and sent via WhatsApp.

description: Asylum seeker Mostafa Azimitabar, know as ‘Moz’ shot and released the music video for his song ‘All The Same’ from inside the Manus Island detention centre via a mobile phone.
